languages.text: Вдохновленные пламенными обращениями проповедников, десятки тысяч подданных Януса вооружились и, словно яростная буря, обрушились на джунгли. Увы, кровавые потери, нанесенные им огнем бунтовщиков, быстро остудили пыл ополченцев. Утратив веру, они обратились в бегство, что лишь умножило число погибших.

traits.locale_text: Вдохновленные пламенными обращениями проповедников, десятки тысяч подданных Януса вооружились и, словно яростная буря, обрушились на джунгли. Увы, кровавые потери, нанесенные им огнем бунтовщиков, быстро остудили пыл ополченцев. Утратив веру, они обратились в бегство, что лишь умножило число погибших.

languages.text: Inspired by the blistering speeches of preachers, tens of thousands of Janusians armed themselves and descended upon the jungle like a raging storm. Alas, under fire from the rebels and incurring heavy losses, the militia's fervour quickly dwindled. Demoralised, they turned tail and fled, which only increased the death count.
languages.original_text: Вдохновленные пламенными обращениями проповедников, десятки тысяч подданных Януса вооружились и, словно яростная буря, обрушились на джунгли. Увы, кровавые потери, нанесенные им огнем бунтовщиков, быстро остудили пыл ополченцев. Утратив веру, они обратились в бегство, что лишь умножило число погибших.

traits.locale_text: Inspired by the blistering speeches of preachers, tens of thousands of Janusians armed themselves and descended upon the jungle like a raging storm. Alas, under fire from the rebels and incurring heavy losses, the militia's fervor quickly dwindled. Demoralized, they turned tail and fled, which only increased the death count.

Inspired by the blistering speeches of preachers, tens of thousands of Janusians armed themselves and descended upon the jungle like a raging storm. Alas, under fire from the rebels and incurring heavy losses, the militia's fervor quickly dwindled. Demoralized, they turned tail and fled, which only increased the death count.

Inspired by the blistering speeches of preachers, tens of thousands of Janusians armed themselves and descended upon the jungle like a raging storm. Alas, under fire from the rebels and incurring heavy losses, the militia's fervor quickly dwindled. Demoralized, they turned tail and fled, which only increased the death count.

Inspired by the blistering speeches of preachers, tens of thousands of Janusians armed themselves and descended upon the jungle like a raging storm. Alas, under fire from the rebels and incurring heavy losses, the militia's fervour quickly dwindled. Demoralised, they turned tail and fled, which only increased the death count.

languages.text: プリーチャーによる過激な説教に触発された数万ものヤヌス人が武装し、荒れ狂う嵐のごとくジャングルへ進撃した。あえなく反逆者の砲火ににさらされては多大な損失を被り、市民軍団の熱情はたちまち消えた。士気を失った市民らはしっぽを巻いて逃げ出し、本作戦は死者の数を増やしただけだった。
languages.original_text: Inspired by the blistering speeches of preachers, tens of thousands of Janusians armed themselves and descended upon the jungle like a raging storm. Alas, under fire from the rebels and incurring heavy losses, the militia's fervour quickly dwindled. Demoralised, they turned tail and fled, which only increased the death count.

traits.locale_text: プリーチャーによる過激な説教に触発された数万ものヤヌス人が武装し、荒れ狂う嵐のごとくジャングルへ進撃した。あえなく反逆者の砲火ににさらされては多大な損失を被り、市民軍団の熱情はたちまち消えた。士気を失った市民らはしっぽを巻いて逃げ出し、本作戦は死者の数を増やしただけだった。

languages.text: 在无数布道士声嘶力竭的演说鼓舞下，数以万计的加努斯人全副武装，如狂风暴雨般涌入丛林。遗憾的是，在叛军的炮火下，民兵损失惨重，热情迅速消退。士气低落的民兵在敌方的火力打击下掉头逃跑，但即便想逃，也仅仅是在徒增伤亡罢了。
languages.original_text: Inspired by the blistering speeches of preachers, tens of thousands of Janusians armed themselves and descended upon the jungle like a raging storm. Alas, under fire from the rebels and incurring heavy losses, the militia's fervour quickly dwindled. Demoralised, they turned tail and fled, which only increased the death count.

traits.locale_text: 在无数布道士声嘶力竭的演说鼓舞下，数以万计的加努斯人全副武装，如狂风暴雨般涌入丛林。遗憾的是，在叛军的炮火下，民兵损失惨重，热情迅速消退。士气低落的民兵在敌方的火力打击下掉头逃跑，但即便想逃，也仅仅是在徒增伤亡罢了。

languages.text: Inspirados por los apasionados discursos de los predicadores, decenas de miles de janusianos tomaron las armas y cayeron sobre la jungla como una furiosa tormenta. Por desgracia, expuestos al fuego intenso de los rebeldes y tras sufrir numerosas bajas, el fervor de la milicia no tardó en evaporarse. Huyeron desmoralizados, incrementando con ello el recuento de bajas.
languages.original_text: Inspired by the blistering speeches of preachers, tens of thousands of Janusians armed themselves and descended upon the jungle like a raging storm. Alas, under fire from the rebels and incurring heavy losses, the militia's fervour quickly dwindled. Demoralised, they turned tail and fled, which only increased the death count.

traits.locale_text: Inspirados por los apasionados discursos de los predicadores, decenas de miles de janusianos tomaron las armas y cayeron sobre la jungla como una furiosa tormenta. Por desgracia, expuestos al fuego intenso de los rebeldes y tras sufrir numerosas bajas, el fervor de la milicia no tardó en evaporarse. Huyeron desmoralizados, incrementando con ello el recuento de bajas.

languages.text: Inspiriert durch die aufpeitschenden Reden von Priestern, griffen Zehntausende von Janusiern zu den Waffen und zogen durch den Dschungel wie ein tobender Sturm. Leider schwand der Kampfgeist der Miliz rasch, als der Beschuss durch die Rebellen zu hohen Verlusten führte. Demoralisiert machte sie kehrt und floh, was die Zahl der Todesopfer nur noch weiter erhöhte.
languages.original_text: Inspired by the blistering speeches of preachers, tens of thousands of Janusians armed themselves and descended upon the jungle like a raging storm. Alas, under fire from the rebels and incurring heavy losses, the militia's fervour quickly dwindled. Demoralised, they turned tail and fled, which only increased the death count.

traits.locale_text: Inspiriert durch die aufpeitschenden Reden von Priestern, griffen Zehntausende von Janusiern zu den Waffen und zogen durch den Dschungel wie ein tobender Sturm. Leider schwand der Kampfgeist der Miliz rasch, als der Beschuss durch die Rebellen zu hohen Verlusten führte. Demoralisiert machte sie kehrt und floh, was die Zahl der Todesopfer nur noch weiter erhöhte.

languages.text: Motivés par les discours cinglants des prêcheurs, des dizaines de milliers de Janusiens prirent les armes pour s'enfoncer dans la jungle avec l'impétuosité d'une tornade. Malheureusement, pris sous le feu des rebelles et essuyant de terribles pertes, les membres de cette milice improvisée perdirent bien vite leur ferveur. Démoralisés, ils firent demi-tour et prirent la fuite, perdant encore un peu plus d'hommes au passage.
languages.original_text: Inspired by the blistering speeches of preachers, tens of thousands of Janusians armed themselves and descended upon the jungle like a raging storm. Alas, under fire from the rebels and incurring heavy losses, the militia's fervour quickly dwindled. Demoralised, they turned tail and fled, which only increased the death count.

traits.locale_text: Motivés par les discours cinglants des prêcheurs, des dizaines de milliers de Janusiens prirent les armes pour s'enfoncer dans la jungle avec l'impétuosité d'une tornade. Malheureusement, pris sous le feu des rebelles et essuyant de terribles pertes, les membres de cette milice improvisée perdirent bien vite leur ferveur. Démoralisés, ils firent demi-tour et prirent la fuite, perdant encore un peu plus d'hommes au passage.

languages.text: Vaizlerin etkileyici nutuklarından ilham bulan on binlerce Januslu, silah kuşanıp ormana hücum etti. Ne yazık ki isyancıların karşı taarruzu altında ağır kayıplar veren milis kuvvetlerinin ışığı çabuk söndü. Motivasyonlarını yitiren birlikler geri çekildi, bu da kayıp sayısını daha da artırdı.
languages.original_text: Inspired by the blistering speeches of preachers, tens of thousands of Janusians armed themselves and descended upon the jungle like a raging storm. Alas, under fire from the rebels and incurring heavy losses, the militia's fervour quickly dwindled. Demoralised, they turned tail and fled, which only increased the death count.

traits.locale_text: Vaizlerin etkileyici nutuklarından ilham bulan on binlerce Januslu, silah kuşanıp ormana hücum etti. Ne yazık ki isyancıların karşı taarruzu altında ağır kayıplar veren milis kuvvetlerinin ışığı çabuk söndü. Motivasyonlarını yitiren birlikler geri çekildi, bu da kayıp sayısını daha da artırdı.
